00042 /*
00043  * This file contains the "capsule/pill" abstraction layered above PTLRPC.
00044  *
00045  * Every struct ptlrpc_request contains a "pill", which points to a description
00046  * of the format that the request conforms to.
00047  */
00048 
00049 #if !defined(__REQ_LAYOUT_USER__)
00050 
00051 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC

00059 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00060 #include <lustre_ver.h>
00061 #include <obd.h>
00062 #include <obd_support.h>
00063 #endif /* !__REQ_LAYOUT_USER__ */
00064 
00065 /* struct ptlrpc_request, lustre_msg* */
00066 #include <lustre_req_layout.h>
00067 #include <lustre_acl.h>

00069 /*
00070  * RQFs (see below) refer to two struct req_msg_field arrays describing the
00071  * client request and server reply, respectively.
00072  */

00820 
00821 struct req_msg_field {
00822         const __u32 rmf_flags;
00823         const char  *rmf_name;
00829         const int   rmf_size;
00830         void        (*rmf_swabber)(void *);
00831         void        (*rmf_dumper)(void *);
00832         int         rmf_offset[ARRAY_SIZE(req_formats)][RCL_NR];
00833 };
00834 
00835 enum rmf_flags {
00839         RMF_F_STRING = 1 << 0,
00843         RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK = 1 << 1,
00849         RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY = 1 << 2
00850 };
00851 
00852 struct req_capsule;
00853 
00854 /*
00855  * Request fields.
00856  */
00857 #define DEFINE_MSGF(name, flags, size, swabber, dumper) {       \
00858         .rmf_name    = (name),                                  \
00859         .rmf_flags   = (flags),                                 \
00860         .rmf_size    = (size),                                  \
00861         .rmf_swabber = (void (*)(void*))(swabber),              \
00862         .rmf_dumper  = (void (*)(void*))(dumper)                \
00863 }
00864 
00865 struct req_msg_field RMF_GENERIC_DATA =
00866         DEFINE_MSGF("generic_data", 0,
00867                     -1, NULL, NULL);
00868 EXPORT_SYMBOL(RMF_GENERIC_DATA);
00869 
00870 struct req_msg_field RMF_MGS_TARGET_INFO =
00871         DEFINE_MSGF("mgs_target_info", 0,
00872                     sizeof(struct mgs_target_info),
00873                     lustre_swab_mgs_target_info, NULL);
00874 EXPORT_SYMBOL(RMF_MGS_TARGET_INFO);
00875

00880 EXPORT_SYMBOL(RMF_MGS_SEND_PARAM);

01239 
01240 /*
01241  * Request formats.
01242  */
01243 
01244 struct req_format {
01245         const char *rf_name;
01246         size_t      rf_idx;
01247         struct {
01248                 size_t                       nr;
01249                 const struct req_msg_field **d;
01250         } rf_fields[RCL_NR];
01251 };
01252 
01253 #define DEFINE_REQ_FMT(name, client, client_nr, server, server_nr) {    \
01254         .rf_name   = name,                                              \
01255         .rf_fields = {                                                  \
01256                 [RCL_CLIENT] = {                                        \
01257                         .nr = client_nr,                                \
01258                         .d  = client                                    \
01259                 },                                                      \
01260                 [RCL_SERVER] = {                                        \
01261                         .nr = server_nr,                                \
01262                         .d  = server                                    \
01263                 }                                                       \
01264         }                                                               \
01265 }
01266 
01267 #define DEFINE_REQ_FMT0(name, client, server)                                  \
01268 DEFINE_REQ_FMT(name, client, ARRAY_SIZE(client), server, ARRAY_SIZE(server))
01269 
01270 struct req_format RQF_OBD_PING =
01271         DEFINE_REQ_FMT0("OBD_PING", empty, empty);
01272 EXPORT_SYMBOL(RQF_OBD_PING);
01273 
01274 struct req_format RQF_OBD_SET_INFO =
01275         DEFINE_REQ_FMT0("OBD_SET_INFO", obd_set_info_client, empty);
01276 EXPORT_SYMBOL(RQF_OBD_SET_INFO);

01691 
01692 #if !defined(__REQ_LAYOUT_USER__)
01693 
01694 /* Convenience macro */
01695 #define FMT_FIELD(fmt, i, j) (fmt)->rf_fields[(i)].d[(j)]
01696 
01701 int req_layout_init(void)
01702 {
01703         size_t i;
01704         size_t j;
01705         size_t k;
01706         struct req_format *rf = NULL;
01707 
01708         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(req_formats); ++i) {
01709                 rf = req_formats[i];
01710                 rf->rf_idx = i;
01711                 for (j = 0; j < RCL_NR; ++j) {
01712                         LASSERT(rf->rf_fields[j].nr <= REQ_MAX_FIELD_NR);
01713                         for (k = 0; k < rf->rf_fields[j].nr; ++k) {
01714                                 struct req_msg_field *field;
01715 
01716                                 field = (typeof(field))rf->rf_fields[j].d[k];
01717                                 LASSERT(!(field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY)
01718                                         || field->rmf_size > 0);
01719                                 LASSERT(field->rmf_offset[i][j] == 0);
01720                                 /*
01721                                  * k + 1 to detect unused format/field
01722                                  * combinations.
01723                                  */
01724                                 field->rmf_offset[i][j] = k + 1;
01725                         }
01726                 }
01727         }
01728         return 0;
01729 }
01730 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_layout_init);
01731 
01732 void req_layout_fini(void)
01733 {
01734 }
01735 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_layout_fini);
01736 
01745 void req_capsule_init_area(struct req_capsule *pill)
01746 {
01747         size_t i;
01748 
01749         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(pill->rc_area[RCL_CLIENT]); i++) {
01750                 pill->rc_area[RCL_CLIENT][i] = -1;
01751                 pill->rc_area[RCL_SERVER][i] = -1;
01752         }
01753 }
01754 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_init_area);
01755 
01762 void req_capsule_init(struct req_capsule *pill,
01763                       struct ptlrpc_request *req,
01764                       enum req_location location)
01765 {
01766         LASSERT(location == RCL_SERVER || location == RCL_CLIENT);
01767 
01768         /*
01769          * Today all capsules are embedded in ptlrpc_request structs,
01770          * but just in case that ever isn't the case, we don't reach
01771          * into req unless req != NULL and pill is the one embedded in
01772          * the req.
01773          *
01774          * The req->rq_pill_init flag makes it safe to initialize a pill
01775          * twice, which might happen in the OST paths as a result of the
01776          * high-priority RPC queue getting peeked at before ost_handle()
01777          * handles an OST RPC.
01778          */
01779         if (req != NULL && pill == &req->rq_pill && req->rq_pill_init)
01780                 return;
01781 
01782         memset(pill, 0, sizeof *pill);
01783         pill->rc_req = req;
01784         pill->rc_loc = location;
01785         req_capsule_init_area(pill);
01786 
01787         if (req != NULL && pill == &req->rq_pill)
01788                 req->rq_pill_init = 1;
01789 }
01790 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_init);
01791 
01792 void req_capsule_fini(struct req_capsule *pill)
01793 {
01794 }
01795 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_fini);
01796 
01797 static int __req_format_is_sane(const struct req_format *fmt)
01798 {
01799         return fmt->rf_idx < ARRAY_SIZE(req_formats) &&
01800                 req_formats[fmt->rf_idx] == fmt;
01801 }
01802 
01803 static struct lustre_msg *__req_msg(const struct req_capsule *pill,
01804                                     enum req_location loc)
01805 {
01806         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
01807 
01808         req = pill->rc_req;
01809         return loc == RCL_CLIENT ? req->rq_reqmsg : req->rq_repmsg;
01810 }
01811 
01816 void req_capsule_set(struct req_capsule *pill, const struct req_format *fmt)
01817 {
01818         LASSERT(pill->rc_fmt == NULL || pill->rc_fmt == fmt);
01819         LASSERT(__req_format_is_sane(fmt));
01820 
01821         pill->rc_fmt = fmt;
01822 }
01823 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_set);
01824 
01833 size_t req_capsule_filled_sizes(struct req_capsule *pill,
01834                                 enum req_location loc)
01835 {
01836         const struct req_format *fmt = pill->rc_fmt;
01837         size_t                   i;
01838 
01839         LASSERT(fmt != NULL);
01840 
01841         for (i = 0; i < fmt->rf_fields[loc].nr; ++i) {
01842                 if (pill->rc_area[loc][i] == -1) {
01843                         pill->rc_area[loc][i] =
01844                                             fmt->rf_fields[loc].d[i]->rmf_size;
01845                         if (pill->rc_area[loc][i] == -1) {
01846                                 /*
01847                                  * Skip the following fields.
01848                                  *
01849                                  * If this LASSERT() trips then you're missing a
01850                                  * call to req_capsule_set_size().
01851                                  */
01852                                 LASSERT(loc != RCL_SERVER);
01853                                 break;
01854                         }
01855                 }
01856         }
01857         return i;
01858 }
01859 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_filled_sizes);
01860 
01868 int req_capsule_server_pack(struct req_capsule *pill)
01869 {
01870         const struct req_format *fmt;
01871         int                      count;
01872         int                      rc;
01873 
01874         LASSERT(pill->rc_loc == RCL_SERVER);
01875         fmt = pill->rc_fmt;
01876         LASSERT(fmt != NULL);
01877 
01878         count = req_capsule_filled_sizes(pill, RCL_SERVER);
01879         rc = lustre_pack_reply(pill->rc_req, count,
01880                                pill->rc_area[RCL_SERVER], NULL);
01881         if (rc != 0) {
01882                 DEBUG_REQ(D_ERROR, pill->rc_req,
01883                        "Cannot pack %d fields in format `%s': ",
01884                        count, fmt->rf_name);
01885         }
01886         return rc;
01887 }
01888 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_server_pack);
01889 
01894 static __u32 __req_capsule_offset(const struct req_capsule *pill,
01895                                   const struct req_msg_field *field,
01896                                   enum req_location loc)
01897 {
01898         int offset;
01899 
01900         offset = field->rmf_offset[pill->rc_fmt->rf_idx][loc];
01901         LASSERTF(offset > 0, "%s:%s, off=%d, loc=%d\n",
01902                             pill->rc_fmt->rf_name,
01903                             field->rmf_name, offset, loc);
01904         offset --;
01905 
01906         LASSERT(0 <= offset && offset < REQ_MAX_FIELD_NR);
01907         return offset;
01908 }
01909 
01914 static
01915 void
01916 swabber_dumper_helper(struct req_capsule *pill,
01917                       const struct req_msg_field *field,
01918                       enum req_location loc,
01919                       int offset,
01920                       void *value, int len, int dump, void (*swabber)( void *))
01921 {
01922         void    *p;
01923         int     i;
01924         int     n;
01925         int     do_swab;
01926         int     inout = loc == RCL_CLIENT;
01927 
01928         swabber = swabber ?: field->rmf_swabber;
01929 
01930         if (ptlrpc_buf_need_swab(pill->rc_req, inout, offset) &&
01931             swabber != NULL && value != NULL)
01932                 do_swab = 1;
01933         else
01934                 do_swab = 0;
01935 
01936         if (!field->rmf_dumper)
01937                 dump = 0;
01938 
01939         if (!(field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY)) {
01940                 if (dump) {
01941                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "Dump of %sfield %s follows\n",
01942                                do_swab ? "unswabbed " : "", field->rmf_name);
01943                         field->rmf_dumper(value);
01944                 }
01945                 if (!do_swab)
01946                         return;
01947                 swabber(value);
01948                 ptlrpc_buf_set_swabbed(pill->rc_req, inout, offset);
01949                 if (dump) {
01950                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "Dump of swabbed field %s "
01951                                "follows\n", field->rmf_name);
01952                         field->rmf_dumper(value);
01953                 }
01954 
01955                 return;
01956         }
01957 
01958         /*
01959          * We're swabbing an array; swabber() swabs a single array element, so
01960          * swab every element.
01961          */
01962         LASSERT((len % field->rmf_size) == 0);
01963         for (p = value, i = 0, n = len / field->rmf_size;
01964              i < n;
01965              i++, p += field->rmf_size) {
01966                 if (dump) {
01967                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "Dump of %sarray field %s, "
01968                                "element %d follows\n",
01969                                do_swab ? "unswabbed " : "", field->rmf_name, i);
01970                         field->rmf_dumper(p);
01971                 }
01972                 if (!do_swab)
01973                         continue;
01974                 swabber(p);
01975                 if (dump) {
01976                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "Dump of swabbed array field %s, "
01977                                "element %d follows\n", field->rmf_name, i);
01978                         field->rmf_dumper(value);
01979                 }
01980         }
01981         if (do_swab)
01982                 ptlrpc_buf_set_swabbed(pill->rc_req, inout, offset);
01983 }
01984 
01995 static void *__req_capsule_get(struct req_capsule *pill,
01996                                const struct req_msg_field *field,
01997                                enum req_location loc,
01998                                void (*swabber)( void *),
01999                                int dump)
02000 {
02001         const struct req_format *fmt;
02002         struct lustre_msg       *msg;
02003         void                    *value;
02004         __u32                    len;
02005         __u32                    offset;
02006 
02007         void *(*getter)(struct lustre_msg *m, __u32 n, __u32 minlen);
02008 
02009         static const char *rcl_names[RCL_NR] = {
02010                 [RCL_CLIENT] = "client",
02011                 [RCL_SERVER] = "server"
02012         };
02013 
02014         LASSERT(pill != NULL);
02015         LASSERT(pill != LP_POISON);
02016         fmt = pill->rc_fmt;
02017         LASSERT(fmt != NULL);
02018         LASSERT(fmt != LP_POISON);
02019         LASSERT(__req_format_is_sane(fmt));
02020 
02021         offset = __req_capsule_offset(pill, field, loc);
02022 
02023         msg = __req_msg(pill, loc);
02024         LASSERT(msg != NULL);
02025 
02026         getter = (field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRING) ?
02027                 (typeof(getter))lustre_msg_string : lustre_msg_buf;
02028 
02029         if (field->rmf_flags & (RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY|RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK)) {
02030                 /*
02031                  * We've already asserted that field->rmf_size > 0 in
02032                  * req_layout_init().
02033                  */
02034                 len = lustre_msg_buflen(msg, offset);
02035                 if (!(field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK) &&
02036                     (len % field->rmf_size) != 0) {
02037                         CERROR("%s: array field size mismatch "
02038                                 "%d modulo %u != 0 (%d)\n",
02039                                 field->rmf_name, len, field->rmf_size, loc);
02040                         return NULL;
02041                 }
02042         } else if (pill->rc_area[loc][offset] != -1) {
02043                 len = pill->rc_area[loc][offset];
02044         } else {
02045                 len = max_t(typeof(field->rmf_size), field->rmf_size, 0);
02046         }
02047         value = getter(msg, offset, len);
02048 
02049         if (value == NULL) {
02050                 DEBUG_REQ(D_ERROR, pill->rc_req,
02051                           "Wrong buffer for field `%s' (%u of %u) "
02052                           "in format `%s': %u vs. %u (%s)\n",
02053                           field->rmf_name, offset, lustre_msg_bufcount(msg),
02054                           fmt->rf_name, lustre_msg_buflen(msg, offset), len,
02055                           rcl_names[loc]);
02056         } else {
02057                 swabber_dumper_helper(pill, field, loc, offset, value, len,
02058                                       dump, swabber);
02059         }
02060 
02061         return value;
02062 }
02063 
02067 void __req_capsule_dump(struct req_capsule *pill, enum req_location loc)
02068 {
02069         const struct    req_format *fmt;
02070         const struct    req_msg_field *field;
02071         __u32           len;
02072         size_t          i;
02073 
02074         fmt = pill->rc_fmt;
02075 
02076         DEBUG_REQ(D_RPCTRACE, pill->rc_req, "BEGIN REQ CAPSULE DUMP\n");
02077         for (i = 0; i < fmt->rf_fields[loc].nr; ++i) {
02078                 field = FMT_FIELD(fmt, loc, i);
02079                 if (field->rmf_dumper == NULL) {
02080                         /*
02081                          * FIXME Add a default hex dumper for fields that don't
02082                          * have a specific dumper
02083                          */
02084                         len = req_capsule_get_size(pill, field, loc);
02085                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "Field %s has no dumper function;"
02086                                 "field size is %u\n", field->rmf_name, len);
02087                 } else {
02088                         /* It's the dumping side-effect that we're interested in */
02089                         (void) __req_capsule_get(pill, field, loc, NULL, 1);
02090                 }
02091         }
02092         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "END REQ CAPSULE DUMP\n");
02093 }
02094 
02098 void req_capsule_client_dump(struct req_capsule *pill)
02099 {
02100         __req_capsule_dump(pill, RCL_CLIENT);
02101 }
02102 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_client_dump);
02103 
02107 void req_capsule_server_dump(struct req_capsule *pill)
02108 {
02109         __req_capsule_dump(pill, RCL_SERVER);
02110 }
02111 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_server_dump);
02112

02212 const void *req_capsule_other_get(struct req_capsule *pill,
02213                                   const struct req_msg_field *field)
02214 {
02215         return __req_capsule_get(pill, field, pill->rc_loc ^ 1, NULL, 0);
02216 }
02217 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_other_get);
02218 
02226 void req_capsule_set_size(struct req_capsule *pill,
02227                           const struct req_msg_field *field,
02228                           enum req_location loc, __u32 size)
02229 {
02230         LASSERT(loc == RCL_SERVER || loc == RCL_CLIENT);
02231 
02232         if ((size != (__u32)field->rmf_size) &&
02233             (field->rmf_size != -1) &&
02234             !(field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK) &&
02235             (size > 0)) {
02236                 __u32 rmf_size = (__u32)field->rmf_size;
02237                 if ((field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY) &&
02238                     (size % rmf_size != 0)) {
02239                         CERROR("%s: array field size mismatch "
02240                                 "%u %% %u != 0 (%d)\n",
02241                                 field->rmf_name, size, rmf_size, loc);
02242                         LBUG();
02243                 } else if (!(field->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY) &&
02244                            size < rmf_size) {
02245                         CERROR("%s: field size mismatch %u != %u (%d)\n",
02246                                 field->rmf_name, size, rmf_size, loc);
02247                         LBUG();
02248                 }
02249         }
02250 
02251         pill->rc_area[loc][__req_capsule_offset(pill, field, loc)] = size;
02252 }
02253 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_set_size);
02254 
02263 __u32 req_capsule_get_size(const struct req_capsule *pill,
02264                          const struct req_msg_field *field,
02265                          enum req_location loc)
02266 {
02267         LASSERT(loc == RCL_SERVER || loc == RCL_CLIENT);
02268 
02269         return lustre_msg_buflen(__req_msg(pill, loc),
02270                                  __req_capsule_offset(pill, field, loc));
02271 }
02272 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_get_size);
02273 
02281 __u32 req_capsule_msg_size(struct req_capsule *pill, enum req_location loc)
02282 {
02283         return lustre_msg_size(pill->rc_req->rq_import->imp_msg_magic,
02284                                pill->rc_fmt->rf_fields[loc].nr,
02285                                pill->rc_area[loc]);
02286 }
02287 
02296 __u32 req_capsule_fmt_size(__u32 magic, const struct req_format *fmt,
02297                          enum req_location loc)
02298 {
02299         __u32 size;
02300         size_t i = 0;
02301 
02302         /*
02303          * This function should probably LASSERT() that fmt has no fields with
02304          * RMF_F_STRUCT_ARRAY in rmf_flags, since we can't know here how many
02305          * elements in the array there will ultimately be, but then, we could
02306          * assume that there will be at least one element, and that's just what
02307          * we do.
02308          */
02309         size = lustre_msg_hdr_size(magic, fmt->rf_fields[loc].nr);
02310         if (size == 0)
02311                 return size;
02312 
02313         for (; i < fmt->rf_fields[loc].nr; ++i)
02314                 if (fmt->rf_fields[loc].d[i]->rmf_size != -1)
02315                         size += cfs_size_round(fmt->rf_fields[loc].d[i]->
02316                                                rmf_size);
02317         return size;
02318 }
02319 
02339 void req_capsule_extend(struct req_capsule *pill, const struct req_format *fmt)
02340 {
02341         int i;
02342         size_t j;
02343 
02344         const struct req_format *old;
02345 
02346         LASSERT(pill->rc_fmt != NULL);
02347         LASSERT(__req_format_is_sane(fmt));
02348 
02349         old = pill->rc_fmt;
02350         /*
02351          * Sanity checking...
02352          */
02353         for (i = 0; i < RCL_NR; ++i) {
02354                 LASSERT(fmt->rf_fields[i].nr >= old->rf_fields[i].nr);
02355                 for (j = 0; j < old->rf_fields[i].nr - 1; ++j) {
02356                         const struct req_msg_field *ofield = FMT_FIELD(old, i, j);
02357 
02358                         /* "opaque" fields can be transmogrified */
02359                         if (ofield->rmf_swabber == NULL &&
02360                             (ofield->rmf_flags & ~RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK) == 0 &&
02361                             (ofield->rmf_size == -1 ||
02362                             ofield->rmf_flags == RMF_F_NO_SIZE_CHECK))
02363                                 continue;
02364                         LASSERT(FMT_FIELD(fmt, i, j) == FMT_FIELD(old, i, j));
02365                 }
02366                 /*
02367                  * Last field in old format can be shorter than in new.
02368                  */
02369                 LASSERT(FMT_FIELD(fmt, i, j)->rmf_size >=
02370                         FMT_FIELD(old, i, j)->rmf_size);
02371         }
02372 
02373         pill->rc_fmt = fmt;
02374 }
02375 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_extend);
02376 
02382 int req_capsule_has_field(const struct req_capsule *pill,
02383                           const struct req_msg_field *field,
02384                           enum req_location loc)
02385 {
02386         LASSERT(loc == RCL_SERVER || loc == RCL_CLIENT);
02387 
02388         return field->rmf_offset[pill->rc_fmt->rf_idx][loc];
02389 }
02390 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_has_field);
02391 
02396 int req_capsule_field_present(const struct req_capsule *pill,
02397                               const struct req_msg_field *field,
02398                               enum req_location loc)
02399 {
02400         __u32 offset;
02401 
02402         LASSERT(loc == RCL_SERVER || loc == RCL_CLIENT);
02403         LASSERT(req_capsule_has_field(pill, field, loc));
02404 
02405         offset = __req_capsule_offset(pill, field, loc);
02406         return lustre_msg_bufcount(__req_msg(pill, loc)) > offset;
02407 }
02408 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_field_present);
02409 
02416 void req_capsule_shrink(struct req_capsule *pill,
02417                         const struct req_msg_field *field,
02418                         __u32 newlen,
02419                         enum req_location loc)
02420 {
02421         const struct req_format *fmt;
02422         struct lustre_msg       *msg;
02423         __u32                    len;
02424         int                      offset;
02425 
02426         fmt = pill->rc_fmt;
02427         LASSERT(fmt != NULL);
02428         LASSERT(__req_format_is_sane(fmt));
02429         LASSERT(req_capsule_has_field(pill, field, loc));
02430         LASSERT(req_capsule_field_present(pill, field, loc));
02431 
02432         offset = __req_capsule_offset(pill, field, loc);
02433 
02434         msg = __req_msg(pill, loc);
02435         len = lustre_msg_buflen(msg, offset);
02436         LASSERTF(newlen <= len, "%s:%s, oldlen=%u, newlen=%u\n",
02437                                 fmt->rf_name, field->rmf_name, len, newlen);
02438 
02439         if (loc == RCL_CLIENT)
02440                 pill->rc_req->rq_reqlen = lustre_shrink_msg(msg, offset, newlen,
02441                                                             1);
02442         else
02443                 pill->rc_req->rq_replen = lustre_shrink_msg(msg, offset, newlen,
02444                                                             1);
02445 }
02446 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_shrink);
02447 
02448 int req_capsule_server_grow(struct req_capsule *pill,
02449                             const struct req_msg_field *field,
02450                             __u32 newlen)
02451 {
02452         struct ptlrpc_reply_state *rs = pill->rc_req->rq_reply_state, *nrs;
02453         char *from, *to;
02454         int rc;
02455         __u32 offset, len;
02456 
02457         LASSERT(pill->rc_fmt != NULL);
02458         LASSERT(__req_format_is_sane(pill->rc_fmt));
02459         LASSERT(req_capsule_has_field(pill, field, RCL_SERVER));
02460         LASSERT(req_capsule_field_present(pill, field, RCL_SERVER));
02461 
02462         len = req_capsule_get_size(pill, field, RCL_SERVER);
02463         offset = __req_capsule_offset(pill, field, RCL_SERVER);
02464         if ((__u32)pill->rc_req->rq_repbuf_len >=
02465             lustre_packed_msg_size(pill->rc_req->rq_repmsg) - len + newlen)
02466                 CERROR("Inplace repack might be done\n");
02467 
02468         pill->rc_req->rq_reply_state = NULL;
02469         req_capsule_set_size(pill, field, RCL_SERVER, newlen);
02470         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(pill);
02471         if (rc) {
02472                 /* put old rs back, the caller will decide what to do */
02473                 pill->rc_req->rq_reply_state = rs;
02474                 return rc;
02475         }
02476         nrs = pill->rc_req->rq_reply_state;
02477         /* Now we need only buffers, copy first chunk */
02478         to = lustre_msg_buf(nrs->rs_msg, 0, 0);
02479         from = lustre_msg_buf(rs->rs_msg, 0, 0);
02480         len = (char *)lustre_msg_buf(rs->rs_msg, offset, 0) - from;
02481         memcpy(to, from, len);
02482         /* check if we have tail and copy it too */
02483         if (rs->rs_msg->lm_bufcount > offset + 1) {
02484                 to = lustre_msg_buf(nrs->rs_msg, offset + 1, 0);
02485                 from = lustre_msg_buf(rs->rs_msg, offset + 1, 0);
02486                 offset = rs->rs_msg->lm_bufcount - 1;
02487                 len = (char *)lustre_msg_buf(rs->rs_msg, offset, 0) +
02488                       cfs_size_round(rs->rs_msg->lm_buflens[offset]) - from;
02489                 memcpy(to, from, len);
02490         }
02491         /* drop old reply if everything is fine */
02492         if (rs->rs_difficult) {
02493                 /* copy rs data */
02494                 int i;
02495 
02496                 nrs->rs_difficult = 1;
02497                 nrs->rs_no_ack = rs->rs_no_ack;
02498                 for (i = 0; i < rs->rs_nlocks; i++) {
02499                         nrs->rs_locks[i] = rs->rs_locks[i];
02500                         nrs->rs_modes[i] = rs->rs_modes[i];
02501                         nrs->rs_nlocks++;
02502                 }
02503                 rs->rs_nlocks = 0;
02504                 rs->rs_difficult = 0;
02505                 rs->rs_no_ack = 0;
02506         }
02507         ptlrpc_rs_decref(rs);
02508         return 0;
02509 }
02510 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_capsule_server_grow);
02511 /* __REQ_LAYOUT_USER__ */
02512 #endif
